scripts.publish: npm run build && cd slides && git init && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -m 'rebuilt' && git remote add origin https://github.com/krawaller/csharp-ht2017.git && git push -f origin gh-pages
scripts.republish: npm run build && cd slides && git add . && git commit -m 'rebuilt' && git push -f origin gh-pages
